## Objective
Analyze absenteeism trends by department.

```{r}
absenteeism <- data.frame(
  Department = c("HR","IT","Finance","IT","HR"),
  DaysAbsent = c(2,4,1,3,2)
)
aggregate(DaysAbsent ~ Department, absenteeism, mean)
```
